++Iskandor
[[Imladril][Imladril's]] consort.
Colors: 
Height 5'1"  Clean shaven. About 700 years old, looks about thirty.

Iskandor, Imladril’s consort, was slim, blond, and clean shaven. His hair was braided into slim braids covered with beads, his eyes were leaf green, his skin darker than Imladril’s. He was dressed in a green jerkin, brown tights, and moccasins.

Sometimes he wears tartan kilts
